榐字的基本解释

榐
zhǎn
古书上说的一种树。
古同“盏”，小杯子。

榐
niǎn
古同“碾”，碾子。

榐
zhèn
古书上说的一种树，汁可做酒：“酒树出典逊国，名榐酒。”

榐字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zhèn］
［《集韻》直刃切，去稕，澄。］
木名。汁可作酒。
[②]［zhǎn］
［《集韻》知輦切，上，知。］
杯盏。

榐字的康熙字典解释

【辰集中】【木字部】　榐； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页542第23
【集韻】知輦切，音展。【顏氏家訓·書證篇】吳人呼盞爲竹簡反，故木傍作展，以代盞字。　又【類篇】丑展切，音蕆。橏榐，樹長貌。　又【集韻】尼展切，音㞋。轢物器。　又【類篇】女箭切，音輾。義同。　又【集韻】直忍切，音朕。木名。汁可爲酒。　又【集韻】丈忍切，音紖。木名。可染。

榐字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
榐字的起名意思

古书上说的一种树。

Squeeze
Basic explanation of words
Squeeze
zhǎn
A kind of tree mentioned in ancient books.
The ancient same "bowl", small cup.
Squeeze
niǎn
Ancient Tong "grinds", grinds the child.
Squeeze
zhèn
It is said in ancient books that the juice can be used to make wine: "The wine tree comes from the country of Pyongxun and is famous for making wine."
Squeeze
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zhèn］
["Jiyun" cuts with a straight edge, goes to the 稕, clears. ]
Wooden name. The juice can be used as wine.
[②]［zhǎn］
["Jiyun" knows and cuts, goes on, knows. ]
Cups.
Squeeze
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Ji] [Wood Character Department] 　榐; Kangxi Strokes: 14; Page Number: Page 542 23
【Ji Yun】Knowing and cutting, sound exhibition. [Family Instructions of the Yan Family: Documentary Evidence] Wu people call the lamp as a bamboo slip, so Mubang made an exhibition to replace the character for the lamp.　[Classes] Ugly exhibition cut, sound 蒇. Wiping, the tree looks long.　[Jiyun] Nizhanqie, sound 㞋.轹物器。　[Classes] The female arrow cuts, the sound is rolled. The same meaning.　[Jiyun] Straighten up and cut, Yin Zhen. Wooden name. The juice can be wine.　[Jiyun] Zhang Renqie, sound malaise. Wooden name. Dyeable.
Squeeze
